actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To authorize any office of the Federal Government which owns or operates a parking area for the use of its employees to install, construct, operate, and maintain a battery recharging station in the area, and for other purposes.
short_title: Electric Vehicle Charging Offers Modern Utility Terminals for Employees Act
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

summary.text:
Electric Vehicle Charging Offers Modern Utility Terminals for Employees Act or the EV-COMUTE Act

This bill authorizes the head of any federal agency that owns or operates a parking area for use by agency employees to: (1) install, construct, operate, and maintain on a reimbursable basis a battery recharging station in such parking area for the use of privately-owned employee vehicles; and (2) charge a user fee to cover the costs of such station.

titles.title: Electric Vehicle Charging Offers Modern Utility Terminals for Employees Act

To authorize any office of the Federal Government which owns or operates a parking area for the use of its employees to install, construct, operate, and maintain a battery recharging station in the area, and for other purposes.
